entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Vaudreuil-Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:26 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
